习题5.9

自变量选择与逐步回归

数据如下表。由定性分析知。所选自变量都与因变量\(y\)由较强的相关性，分别用后退法和逐步回归法做自变量选元。

library(haven)
data = read_sav("data/xt5.9.sav")
head(data)
# A tibble: 6 × 8
   年份    x1    x2    x3     x4    x5    x6     y
  <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>  <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>
1  1978 1018. 1607   138.  96259 2239. 50760 1132.
2  1979 1259. 1770.  144.  97542 2619. 39370 1146.
3  1980 1359. 1996.  196.  98705 2976. 44530 1160.
4  1981 1546. 2048.  207. 100072 3309. 39790 1176.
5  1982 1762. 2162.  221. 101654 3638. 33130 1212.
6  1983 1961. 2376.  271. 103008 4020. 34710 1367.
# 建立模型
model = lm(y ~., data[, -1])
summary(model)

Call:
lm(formula = y ~ ., data = data[, -1])

Residuals:
    Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max 
-374.18  -82.44   -3.00   91.05  237.52 

Coefficients:
              Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept)  1.348e+03  2.211e+03   0.610 0.551859    
x1          -6.410e-01  1.669e-01  -3.840 0.001804 ** 
x2          -3.170e-01  2.044e-01  -1.551 0.143216    
x3          -4.127e-01  5.485e-01  -0.752 0.464294    
x4          -2.110e-03  2.428e-02  -0.087 0.931962    
x5           6.711e-01  1.280e-01   5.241 0.000125 ***
x6          -7.541e-03  8.128e-03  -0.928 0.369220    
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 191.8 on 14 degrees of freedom
Multiple R-squared:  0.9962,    Adjusted R-squared:  0.9946 
F-statistic:   618 on 6 and 14 DF,  p-value: 3.81e-16

后退法

model_back = step(model, direction="backward", trace=0)
summary(model_back)

Call:
lm(formula = y ~ x1 + x2 + x5, data = data[, -1])

Residuals:
    Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max 
-372.27 -102.79   -7.78  157.94  313.69 

Coefficients:
             Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept) 874.58627  106.86620   8.184 2.67e-07 ***
x1           -0.61116    0.12382  -4.936 0.000125 ***
x2           -0.35304    0.08840  -3.994 0.000940 ***
x5            0.63669    0.08914   7.142 1.65e-06 ***
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 183.1 on 17 degrees of freedom
Multiple R-squared:  0.9958,    Adjusted R-squared:  0.9951 
F-statistic:  1356 on 3 and 17 DF,  p-value: < 2.2e-16

逐步回归法

# 逐步回归法
model_both = step(model, direction="both", trace=0)
summary(model_both)

Call:
lm(formula = y ~ x1 + x2 + x5, data = data[, -1])

Residuals:
    Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max 
-372.27 -102.79   -7.78  157.94  313.69 

Coefficients:
             Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept) 874.58627  106.86620   8.184 2.67e-07 ***
x1           -0.61116    0.12382  -4.936 0.000125 ***
x2           -0.35304    0.08840  -3.994 0.000940 ***
x5            0.63669    0.08914   7.142 1.65e-06 ***
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 183.1 on 17 degrees of freedom
Multiple R-squared:  0.9958,    Adjusted R-squared:  0.9951 
F-statistic:  1356 on 3 and 17 DF,  p-value: < 2.2e-16

答：后退法与逐步回归法所保留的变量相同。最终都得到回归方程：\(\hat{y}=874.6-0.611x_1-0.353x_2+0.637x_5\)。但是回归系数的解释不合理。
